name: Garbage fishing tycoon
description:
it's year 2028 all the marine life is in danger due to garbage pollouted the entire water  . You are a worker in W.M.O(World Marinelife Organization) your mission is to collect garbage and make ocean a better place once again!!!

-Game-

  • (Made in 7 days)
  • Tycoon like.

- Upgrades -

1 - net spawner - increases the net spawn rate

Cost - 10 

2 - Money increase - Doubles the amount of money you get by collecting garbage

Cost - 15

3 - Click click - Allows you to collect garbage by clicking it.

Cost - 50

-Devlog-


-Note- 

It's pretty short

Water shader is by DAMIEN MAYANCE - https://dmayance.com/water-surface-2d-unity/
